get.summary: Search for entities in the Monarch knowledge graph
get.description: Search for entities in the Monarch knowledge graph

parameters.description: The ontology term to search for.

schema.title: Term
schema.description: The ontology term to search for.

parameters.name: term

parameters.description: A single category to search within as a string. Valid categories are: biolink:Disease, biolink:PhenotypicQuality, and biolink:Gene

schema.title: Category
schema.description: A single category to search within as a string. Valid categories are: biolink:Disease, biolink:PhenotypicQuality, and biolink:Gene

parameters.name: category

parameters.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Offset for pagination of results

schema.title: Offset
schema.description: Offset for pagination of results

parameters.name: offset

200.description: Search results for the given ontology term

get.summary: Allows fuzzy-matching of genes and/or diseases to each other. The input is provided as a list of genes and/or diseases from which associated phenotypes will be extracted and unioned.
get.description: Semantic similarity search, or fuzzy search, between genes and/or diseases.

parameters.description: The ontology identifiers to search for as a list of gene and/or disease IDs.

schema.title: Ids
schema.description: The ontology identifiers to search for as a list of gene and/or disease IDs.

parameters.name: ids

parameters.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

parameters.name: limit

200.description: Search results as an array of MatchItem objects.

get.summary: Returns information on entities such as name, description, synonyms, categories, and counts of associations to other entities of different types.
get.description: Get information about arbitrary entities by identifier, e.g. MONDO:0005737, HP:0002721, HGNC:1884.

parameters.description: List of entity ids

schema.title: Ids
schema.description: List of entity ids

parameters.name: ids

200.description: A JSON array of entity descriptors.

get.summary: Get a list of genes associated with a disease
get.description: Get a list of genes associated with a disease

parameters.description: The ontology identifier of the disease.

schema.title: Disease Id
schema.description: The ontology identifier of the disease.

parameters.name: disease_id

parameters.description: The maximum number of associations to return.

schema.title: Limit
schema.description: The maximum number of associations to return.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Offset for pagination of results

schema.title: Offset
schema.description: Offset for pagination of results

parameters.name: offset

200.description: A GeneAssociations object containing a list of GeneAssociation objects

schema.description: The maximum number of associations to return.

parameters.description: Offset for pagination of results.

schema.title: Offset
schema.description: Offset for pagination of results.

parameters.name: offset

200.description: A PhenotypeAssociations object containing a list of PhenotypeAssociation objects

schema.description: The maximum number of associations to return.

schema.description: Offset for pagination of results

label.title: Label
label.description: The type of the associations (e.g. Disease or Gene)

count.title: Count
count.description: The number of associations of that type.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Other metadata associaciated with the entity or association.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: List of related publications and associated metadata.

disease_id.title: Disease Id
disease_id.description: The ontology identifier of the disease.

label.title: Label
label.description: The human-readable label of the disease.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Other metadata associaciated with the entity or association.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: List of related publications and associated metadata.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the association (causal or correlated).

total.title: Total
total.description: The total number of disease associations available.

metadata.description: Other metadata associaciated with the entity or association.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ontology identifier of the entity.

name.title: Name
name.description: The human-readable label of the entity.

symbol.title: Symbol
symbol.description: The symbol of the entity, usually a short name like FBN1.

association_counts.title: Association Counts
association_counts.description: Counts of associations between this entity and other entities of different types.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Other metadata associaciated with the entity or association.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: List of related publications and associated metadata.

gene_id.title: Gene Id
gene_id.description: The ontology identifier of the gene.

label.title: Label
label.description: The human-readable label of the gene.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Other metadata associaciated with the entity or association.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: List of related publications and associated metadata.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total number of gene associations available.

gene_url_template.title: Gene Url Template
gene_url_template.description: URL template for constructing links to the Monarch Initiative website.

rank.title: Rank
rank.description: The rank of the match, with 1 being the closest match.

score.title: Score
score.description: The score of the matching item using the phenodigm metric.

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the matching item, e.g. disease or gene.

taxon.title: Taxon
taxon.description: The taxon of the matching item as a dict with keys for id and label.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ontology identifier of the matching item.

label.title: Label
label.description: The human-readable label of the matching item.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Other metadata associaciated with the entity or association.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: List of related publications and associated metadata.

phenotype_id.title: Phenotype Id
phenotype_id.description: The ontology identifier of the phenotype.

label.title: Label
label.description: The human-readable label of the phenotype.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Other metadata associaciated with the entity or association.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: List of related publications and associated metadata.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total number of phenotype associations available.

phenotype_url_template.title: Phenotype Url Template
phenotype_url_template.description: URL template for constructing links to the Monarch Initiative website.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ontology identifier of the search result.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the search result.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: The categories of the search result.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the search result.
description.example: Cystic fibrosis (CF) is a genetic disorder characterized by the production of sweat with a high salt content and mucus secretions with an abnormal viscosity.

total.title: Total
total.description: The total number of search results available.
